title: To direct the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate a rule that requires manufacturers of certain consumer products to establish and maintain a system for providing notification of recalls of such products to consumers who first purchase such a product.
content: Product Safety Notification and Recall Effectiveness Act of 2005 - Instructs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate a rule under the Consumer Product Safety Act that requires the manufacturer of a covered consumer product to establish and maintain a consumer notification system for product recalls. Defines covered consumer product as: (1) a juvenile product, (2) a small household appliance. And (3) such other products as the Commission considers appropriate for achieving the purpose of this Act . Prescribes database requirements.
